Title: Relates to authorizing Joseph Murphy to receive a refund for military service credit purchased in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Joseph Murphy, a former employee of the NYS department of corrections and community supervision, to receive a refund for military service credit purchased in the New York state and local employees' retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing Joseph Murphy to receive a refund for military service credit purchased in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
